content: What is Canva?Canva is a graphic design platform that allows users to create social media graphics, presentations, posters, documents and other visual content. Users can choose from many professional designed templates, and edit the designs and upload their own photos through a drag and drop interface.What are the features?Millions of Images - Design with millions of stock photographs, vectors and illustrations. You can even upload your own.Photo Filters - Edit your photos using preset filters or get advanced with photo editing tools, you’ll never be stuck for choice.Free Icons & Shapes - Use icons, shapes and elements with ease. Choose from thousands of elements for your designs, or upload your own.Hundreds of Fonts - Access a great selection of fonts perfect for every design. All ready to go and accessible within Canva.Customizable branding - Users can easily customize branding on the design.Presentations - Create and design a beautiful presentation for your next project.Collaborate with partners - Design freely with your friend, family, and relatives.Share via email, text, messaging apps - Share your design and project to many people.And many more!Why buy Canva Premium from me?Private Account - You can change your email and password anytime.Existing Account - You can use your existing account if you are already registered before.Warranty - No need to worry about the account issue in the future, I will gladly help you.Good Price - Save your money and get a cheaper price from me.Safe - I use a safe method to prevent account issues in the future.Discount - You will be able to get a discount if buying bulk.
